Typealiases.html#/VGSJSONData.name: VGSJSONData
Typealiases.html#/VGSJSONData.abstract: Key-value data type, usually used for response format.

Typealiases.html#/VGSHTTPHeaders.name: VGSHTTPHeaders
Typealiases.html#/VGSHTTPHeaders.abstract: Key-value data type, used in http request headers.

Structs/VGSLoggingConfiguration.html#/is.name: isNetworkDebugEnabled
Structs/VGSLoggingConfiguration.html#/is.abstract: Bool flag. Specify true to record VGSShowSDK network session with success/failed requests. Default is false.

Structs/VGSLoggingConfiguration.html#/is.name: isExtensiveDebugEnabled
Structs/VGSLoggingConfiguration.html#/is.abstract: Bool flag. Specify true to enable extensive debugging. Default is false.

Structs/VGSTextRange.html.name: VGSTextRange
Structs/VGSTextRange.html.abstract: An object representing text range with closed boundaries.

Protocols/VGSLabelDelegate.html#/labelTe.name: labelTextDidChange(_:)
Protocols/VGSLabelDelegate.html#/labelTe.abstract: Tells the delegate when text changes in the specified label.

Protocols/VGSLabelDelegate.html#/labelCo.name: labelCopyTextDidFinish(_:format:)
Protocols/VGSLabelDelegate.html#/labelCo.abstract: Tells the delegate when raw text is copied in the specified label.

Protocols/VGSLabelDelegate.html#/labelRe.name: labelRevealDataDidFail(_:error:)
Protocols/VGSLabelDelegate.html#/labelRe.abstract: Tells the delegate when reveal data operation was failed for the subscribed VGSLabel view.

Enums/VGSErrorType.html#/unexpectedRespo.name: unexpectedResponseDataFormat
Enums/VGSErrorType.html#/unexpectedRespo.abstract: When reponse data format is not supported.

Enums/VGSErrorType.html#/responseIsInval.name: responseIsInvalidJSON
Enums/VGSErrorType.html#/responseIsInval.abstract: When response cannot be decoded to json.

Enums/VGSErrorType.html#/fieldNotFound.name: fieldNotFound
Enums/VGSErrorType.html#/fieldNotFound.abstract: When field cannot be found in specified path.

Enums/VGSErrorType.html#/invalidConfigur.name: invalidConfigurationURL
Enums/VGSErrorType.html#/invalidConfigur.abstract: When VGS config URL is not valid.

Enums/VGSEnvironment.html#/sandbox.name: sandbox
Enums/VGSEnvironment.html#/sandbox.abstract: Should be used for development and testing purpose.

Global%20Variables.html#/VGSShowSDKError.name: VGSShowSDKErrorDomain
Global%20Variables.html#/VGSShowSDKError.abstract: An error domain string used to produce VGSError from VGSShowSDK - “vgsshow.sdk”.

Classes/VGSLabel.html#/delegate.name: delegate
Classes/VGSLabel.html#/delegate.abstract: The object that acts as the delegate of the VGSLabel.

Classes/VGSLabel.html#/addTransformation.name: addTransformationRegex(_:template:)
Classes/VGSLabel.html#/addTransformation.abstract: Add transformation regex to format raw revealed text.

Classes/VGSLabel.html#/contentPath.name: contentPath
Classes/VGSLabel.html#/contentPath.abstract: Name that will be associated with VGSLabel and used as a decoding contentPath on request response with revealed data from your organization vault.

Classes/VGSLabel.html#/isEmpty.name: isEmpty
Classes/VGSLabel.html#/isEmpty.abstract: A Boolean value indicating whether VGSLabel string is empty.

Classes/VGSLabel.html#/isSecureText.name: isSecureText
Classes/VGSLabel.html#/isSecureText.abstract: Bool flag. Apply secure mask if true. If secure range is not defined mask all text. Default is false.

Classes/VGSLabel.html#/secureTextSymbol.name: secureTextSymbol
Classes/VGSLabel.html#/secureTextSymbol.abstract: Text Symbol that will replace visible label text character when securing String. Should be one charcter only.

Classes/VGSLabel.html#/clearText().name: clearText()
Classes/VGSLabel.html#/clearText().abstract: Clear last revealed text and set it to nil. IMPORTANT! New request is required to populate label with revealed data.

Classes/VGSLabel.html#/setSecureText(sta.name: setSecureText(start:end:)
Classes/VGSLabel.html#/setSecureText(sta.abstract: Set text range to be replaced with VGSLabel.secureTextSymbol.

Classes/VGSLabel.html#/setSecureText(ran.name: setSecureText(ranges:)
Classes/VGSLabel.html#/setSecureText(ran.abstract: Set array of text ranges to be replaced with VGSLabel.secureTextSymbol.

Classes/VGSLabel.html#/paddings.name: paddings
Classes/VGSLabel.html#/paddings.abstract: UIEdgeInsets for text. IMPORTANT! Paddings should be non-negative.

Classes/VGSLabel.html#/placeholderPaddin.name: placeholderPaddings
Classes/VGSLabel.html#/placeholderPaddin.abstract: UIEdgeInsets for placeholder. Default is nil. If placeholder paddings not set, paddings property will be used to control placeholder insets. IMPORTANT! Paddings should be non-negative.

Classes/VGSLabel.html#/vgsAccessibilityL.name: vgsAccessibilityLabel
Classes/VGSLabel.html#/vgsAccessibilityL.abstract: A succinct label in a localized string that identifies the accessibility element.

Classes/VGSLabel.html#/vgsAccessibilityH.name: vgsAccessibilityHint
Classes/VGSLabel.html#/vgsAccessibilityH.abstract: A localized string that contains a brief description of the result of performing an action on the accessibility element.

Classes/VGSShow.html#/subscribedLabels.name: subscribedLabels
Classes/VGSShow.html#/subscribedLabels.abstract: Returns an Array of VGSLabel objects subscribed to specific VGSShow instance.

Classes/VGSShow.html#/request(path:metho.name: request(path:method:payload:requestOptions:completion:)
Classes/VGSShow.html#/request(path:metho.abstract: Send request to reveal data on specific path. VGSShow instance will use all subsribed elements contentPaths to reveal data.

Classes/VGSShow.html.name: VGSShow
Classes/VGSShow.html.abstract: An object you use for revealing and displaying data in corresponding subscribed VGS Show SDK views.

Classes/VGSShowError.html.name: VGSShowError
Classes/VGSShowError.html.abstract: An error produced by VGSShowSDK. Works similar to default NSError in iOS.

Classes/VGSLabel.html.name: VGSLabel
Classes/VGSLabel.html.abstract: A view that displays revealed text data.

Classes/VGSLogger.html.name: VGSLogger
Classes/VGSLogger.html.abstract: VGSLogger encapsulates logging logic and debugging options for VGSShowSDK. Use .configuration property to setup these options.

Global%20Variables.html.name: Global Variables
Global%20Variables.html.abstract: The following global variables are available globally.

Typealiases.html.name: Type Aliases
Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
